Animated Sliding Page Elements

As you scroll down the page, individual blocks will animate into view. These only happen once per pageload and only when the viewport provides enough room for the whole element.

We append a new class onto the container which then animates using CSS3 transitions.

But what fun would this be if all the elements were above the fold?
